game_description: Play bowling and arcade games with your friends in VR There's the classic games you would find in an arcade and more to come. Features: Online multiplayer with voice chat 8 bowling lanes Ski-ball Basketball Darts Dominoes Crazy Eights For more info, and issues please email me at: braulio@chamvr.com
review_1: it's stuck on loading screen after trying to enter demo server idk what to do may just delete game I had hi hopes but been stuck 3/4 loaded for 30+ min
review_3: As far as the game itself it's great different stuff to keep entertained. When it comes to other people(aka children) I miss them running down my lane mid frame as messing with my game playing. Only thing I could ask for is somethings like mutable options for other avatars and maybe a barrier between lanes so balls don't mysteriously fly from the side hitting my ball into the gutter. I'm an old guy (47) and am new to VR so I struggle with movement mechanics enuf without the help from others. So I'm giving it a solid 3-3 1/2 stars
review_4: It's a Fun Arcade game with lots of different options and it's FREE! What more can you want from a free game?
review_5: I’m confused on how to join a server none of my codes work and the only working server is not working
